Container.Name: scanservjs
Container.Overview: scanservjs is a web UI frontend for your scanner. It allows you to share one or more scanners (using SANE) on a network without the need for drivers or complicated installation.

Config.Name: Local / USB Scanner
Config.Description:
Path to your Local / USB scanner.
Run `lsusb` and find your scanner.
E.g.: Bus 007 Device 003: ID 04a9:170c Canon, Inc. PIXMA MP500 Scanner
It's the Bus 007 Device 003, so the path to is should be: /dev/bus/usb/007/003

Config.Name: Network Scanner Address
Config.Description: Enter IP if using a network scanner. Leave blank if using a USB / local scanner.

Config.Name: Storage
Config.Description: Where the scans and previews will be stored
